alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Troup; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, southwestern Pike, northern Upson, southeastern Troup, northwestern Talbot and northeastern Harris Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Stovall, or 10 miles southwest of Greenville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Greenville, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Woodbury, Warm Springs, Woodland, Molena, Sunset Village, The Rock, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Lincoln Park, Shiloh, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Atwater, Flint Hill, Odessadale, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Stovall, and Sunnyside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Harris; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Troup; Upson
